Multilingual multiuser multi-blog engine.

Version: 0.9-CVS

Setup Links: My b2evo · Online Manual · My DB Install · My Blogs · My Back-Office

Available translations for this page:

  • English (EU)
  • German (DE)

Welcome!

b2evolution is a PHP multilingual multiuser multiblog engine. You will find complete information on the official b2evolution website.

Quickstart instructions:

You can setup b2evolution in a just a few minutes. Just follow the instructions matching your situation:

  • New users: installing b2evolution from scratch
  • Existing b2evolution users:
    • Upgrading from b2evolution version 0.8.6 or later (prior to version 0.8.9)
    • Upgrading from b2evolution version 0.8.0 or later (prior to version 0.8.6)
  • Cafelog/b2 users: upgrading from b2 version 0.6.x
